channel.title: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable
channel.description:
Seriously. Why? Butler and Drunk are super confirmable. Just target someone with anything and BAM! Your confirmed. Obviously it can make a decent last resort and if you are converted/invoker or something then sure that's fine. But a MM or starting assassin should not be claiming drunk.
If you do this or know why other's do then please explain because I don't get it.

item.title: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Wouldn’t that make everyone but Psychic, Noble and Prince claimable?

Actually that STILL wouldn’t answer the question because the Butler has a confirmable day ability!

Read full topic
item.source: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable

item.title: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Ok but you know what I am talking about right? About people SAYING he is fake claimable? I know he isn’t and that’s why I am confused right now.

because many people assume no one looks at logs…

Read full topic

item.title: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Nigh impossible unless you are the converted form (or Invoker converted from Killer). Too easy to prove. Worst claim for other classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Did I miss something? People have been telling me that Butler/Drunk are fake claimable
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’ve heard people saying stuff like “Assassins are always claiming drunk” or “Butler is a good MM claim” Or whatever. That’s what I am asking about.

Read full topic
